title: Home Of Franklin D Roosevelt National Historic Site: Be A Junior Ranger
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Kids & Youth     Be A Junior Ranger              Be A Junior Ranger          The Junior Secret Service Program at the Home of Franklin D. Roosevelt is designed for children ages 7-12.  The handbook and badge are available at the front desk of the Wallace Center upon request.  This kids activity is free! You can also complete the Junior Secret Service Program on-line.  Download the program manual and complete as many activities as you can.  Once you are done, send your results to Park Ranger Dan Woodard to receive your certificate and badge. Download the Junior Secret Service Training Manual (839KB PDF) (Please note, the Home of Franklin D. Roosevelt does not offer a separate Junior Ranger Program)       FDR and Secret Service             Songs for a Junior Ranger
